Secondly, the show should have started at 19:30 p.m., and it began fourty-fiveforty-five minutes laterlate.
Moreover, when I went to buy the tickets no discounts were avaliableavailable.

Furthermore, I wanted to have a coffecoffee after the show, but when I tried to get to the theatre restaurant, it was closed. A police officer who was there told me that the manager of the restaurant was ill and that he didn'twouldn't allowedallow anyone to open it.
This was the worst night that I had during my stay in London.
For all thatthese reasons, I want you to refund the cost of the tickets and to send the money back to my house.
